prompt_en: In a still frame, a stop sign
prompt_opt: In a still frame, a red octagonal stop sign stands prominently against a backdrop of a quiet suburban street. The stop sign is the focal point, capturing the essence of a tranquil neighborhood intersection.

The lighting is soft and ambient, casting gentle shadows and highlighting the intricate details of the scene. The overall effect is one of stillness and tranquility, as if time itself has paused to create a perfect, otherworldly moment.

Next to it, a tall, white pole supports a vivid red stop sign, its octagonal shape clearly visible. The scene is set on a quiet residential street, with well-manicured lawns and mature trees lining the sides. The contrast between the vibrant reds of the fire hydrant and stop sign against the greenery and blue sky creates a striking visual.

prompt_en: a stop sign and a parking meter

The parking meter, painted a classic silver, has a small digital display showing the time remaining. The scene is captured in high definition, emphasizing the textures and details of the metal surfaces, with a soft afternoon light casting gentle shadows. The background includes a few parked cars and a row of old brick buildings, adding to the nostalgic atmosphere.

prompt_en: A person is catching or throwing frisbee

They catch a frisbee with a fluid motion, their body twisting gracefully. In the next scene, they throw the frisbee with a powerful flick of the wrist, their face showing determination and focus. The frisbee soars through the air, capturing the essence of a perfect, sunny day. The person's casual yet athletic attire, including a pair of white sneakers, complements the lively, outdoor setting.

prompt_en: A person is playing trumpet
prompt_opt: A person stands in a dimly lit room, the warm glow of a single lamp casting a soft shadow. They are dressed in a dark suit with a crisp white shirt, holding a gleaming silver trumpet. Their lips press firmly against the mouthpiece as they begin to play, their eyes closed in concentration. The camera captures a close-up of their hands moving skillfully over the valves, emphasizing the precision and passion in their performance. The background remains simple, allowing the focus to remain on the musician and the rich, melodic sounds filling the air.

prompt_en: A person is flying kite
prompt_opt: A person stands in a vast, sunlit meadow, holding a vibrant kite string. The kite, a brilliant shade of blue with intricate patterns, soars high in the clear blue sky, catching the wind. The person, dressed in a casual white t-shirt and dark jeans, looks up with a smile, enjoying the peaceful afternoon. The scene captures the joy and serenity of the moment, with the gentle breeze rustling the grass and the kite gracefully dancing in the air.

prompt_en: A person is filling eyebrows
prompt_opt: A person sits in front of a vanity mirror, meticulously filling in their eyebrows with a precision brow pencil. The room is softly lit, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Their focused expression and careful hand movements highlight the attention to detail. The person wears a simple white top and has their hair loosely tied back, emphasizing the elegance of the grooming process. The video captures the transformation as the eyebrows gradually become perfectly shaped and defined, enhancing their natural beauty.

prompt_en: A person is shuffling cards
prompt_opt: A person with neatly styled hair and a casual yet stylish outfit, including a dark sweater and jeans, sits at a sleek wooden table. They expertly shuffle a deck of cards with practiced movements, their hands moving with precision and grace. The ambient lighting highlights the texture of the cards and the smooth surface of the table. The scene captures the focus and skill of the card handler, creating a sense of anticipation and intrigue.

prompt_en: A person is folding clothes
prompt_opt: A person stands in a cozy, well-lit room, meticulously folding clothes on a wooden table. They wear a simple white t-shirt and dark blue jeans, their hands gently smoothing out a soft, patterned blanket. The room is filled with the warmth of natural sunlight streaming through a large window, casting a serene glow. As they continue, they fold a variety of items, from crisp shirts to cozy sweaters, each piece carefully placed in a neat stack. The calm, organized atmosphere highlights the peaceful routine of daily life.

prompt_en: A person is smoking
prompt_opt: A person stands in a dimly lit room, the soft glow of a single lamp casting shadows on the walls. They hold a cigarette between their fingers, the tip glowing red as they take a slow, deliberate puff. Smoke curls upward, creating a hazy atmosphere. Their eyes are half-closed, exuding a sense of calm and reflection. The room is filled with a quiet stillness, emphasizing the solitary nature of the moment.

prompt_en: A person is tai chi
prompt_opt: A serene individual, dressed in loose-fitting white garments, stands on a tranquil, grassy hilltop at sunrise. They begin a series of fluid tai chi movements, their arms gracefully extending and retracting, their body flowing with the gentle morning breeze. The peaceful surroundings, with distant trees and a soft, golden sky, enhance the meditative atmosphere. Their focused expression and deliberate motions capture the essence of tai chi, blending physical movement with inner calm.

prompt_en: A person is squat
prompt_opt: A person in athletic gear, wearing a black tank top and gray workout leggings, stands in a well-lit gym. They begin a deep squat, their muscles tensing and their focus intense. The background features sleek gym equipment and large mirrors, reflecting their determined expression and perfect form. The camera captures a close-up of their face, showing concentration and effort. Finally, they rise smoothly from the squat, demonstrating strength and control, with the gym's modern aesthetic enhancing the dynamic scene.

prompt_en: A person is playing controller
prompt_opt: A person sits on a comfortable couch, intensely focused on a video game controller in their hands. They are dressed in casual attire, wearing a gray sweater and dark jeans. The room is modern and cozy, with warm lighting and a large TV screen displaying vibrant gameplay. The person's facial expressions shift from concentration to excitement as they navigate through the game, their fingers deftly pressing buttons. The atmosphere is lively, capturing the thrill and engagement of gaming.

prompt_en: A person is throwing axe
prompt_opt: A rugged individual, dressed in a dark flannel shirt and black jeans, stands in a forest clearing, gripping a heavy, polished axe. The scene opens with a close-up of their intense, focused expression, the sun filtering through the trees casting dappled shadows. They take a deep breath, then swing the axe back with fluid precision. In slow motion, the axe flies through the air, spinning gracefully before embedding itself with a satisfying thud into a large wooden target. The person's triumphant smile and the crisp, autumnal surroundings enhance the sense of mastery and connection to nature.

prompt_en: A person is giving or receiving award
prompt_opt: A distinguished individual in a sharp, navy blue suit stands on a stage, illuminated by warm stage lights, as they receive an award. The audience, dressed formally, claps enthusiastically in the background. The person holds the trophy aloft, their face beaming with pride and accomplishment. A large screen behind them displays their name and the award category, emphasizing the significance of the moment. The setting is elegant, with a red curtain and a polished wooden podium, adding to the ceremonial atmosphere.

prompt_en: A person is air drumming
prompt_opt: A person stands in a dimly lit room, passionately air drumming with intense focus. Wearing a black T-shirt and dark jeans, they move their arms with rhythmic precision, mimicking the beats of an invisible drum kit. Their facial expressions convey pure enjoyment and immersion in the music. The camera captures close-ups of their hands and face, highlighting the energy and enthusiasm of their performance, set against a simple, shadowy background.

prompt_en: A person is taking a shower

Steam rises around them, adding to the serene ambiance. The person's face is tilted upward, eyes closed, embracing the warmth and tranquility of the moment. The sleek, minimalist design of the shower, with its glass doors and chrome fixtures, enhances the sense of cleanliness and modernity.

prompt_en: A person is planting trees
prompt_opt: A person in a green t-shirt and khaki pants kneels in a sunny meadow, carefully planting a young sapling. They use a spade to dig the soil, their hands gentle and purposeful. The landscape around them is vibrant, with wildflowers and tall grass swaying in the breeze. As they stand back to admire their work, a smile of satisfaction spreads across their face. The scene transitions to show them planting more trees, each one a step towards a greener future, with the warm sunlight casting a golden glow over the meadow.

prompt_en: A person is sharpening knives

The camera captures close-ups of their hands, showing the precise movements and the gleam of the blades as they become increasingly sharp. The background includes a clean, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a wooden cutting board, emphasizing the professional and focused nature of the task.

prompt_en: A person is robot dancing

They wear a black jacket with silver accents, black pants, and white sneakers, their movements synchronized to an electronic beat. The background is a blend of deep blues and purples, with glowing neon lights casting a futuristic glow. The dancer's face is partially obscured by a silver helmet, adding to the mechanical aesthetic. Their arms and legs move in sharp, calculated motions, creating a mesmerizing display of controlled energy and precision.

prompt_en: A person is rock climbing
prompt_opt: A skilled climber, dressed in a vibrant red harness and a dark blue helmet, scales a towering granite cliff face. The rugged terrain, marked by cracks and crevices, provides a challenging yet exhilarating route. The climber's muscles tense with each deliberate move, hands gripping the rough surface and feet finding secure footholds. Sunlight filters through the surrounding trees, casting dappled shadows on the rock, enhancing the dramatic atmosphere. The climber pauses momentarily to look back, a mix of determination and awe visible on their face, before continuing their ascent with unwavering resolve.

prompt_en: A person is hula hooping
prompt_opt: A vibrant individual, dressed in a flowing yellow sundress and barefoot, stands on a lush green lawn, surrounded by tall grass and wildflowers. They begin hula hooping with a large, colorful hoop, their movements graceful and fluid. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow and highlighting the joy and energy in their expression. As they continue, the hoop glides smoothly around their waist, occasionally rising to their shoulders and arms, demonstrating their skill and enthusiasm. The serene natural setting and the person's joyful demeanor create a captivating and lively scene.

prompt_en: A person is writing
prompt_opt: A person sits at a rustic wooden desk, surrounded by warm, ambient lighting from a nearby lamp. They wear a cozy sweater and glasses, their hand elegantly gripping a fountain pen as they write in a leather-bound journal. The room is filled with the soft glow of candlelight, and a cup of steaming tea rests beside the journal. The person's focused expression and the gentle rustle of paper create a serene and introspective atmosphere.

prompt_en: A person is bungee jumping
prompt_opt: A daring individual, dressed in a black jumpsuit and helmet, stands at the edge of a towering bridge, overlooking a vast canyon. The camera captures their determined expression as they take a deep breath. Suddenly, they leap into the air, the bungee cord stretching taut as they plummet toward the rushing river below. Mid-descent, their body twists and turns with the force of gravity, creating a thrilling visual. Finally, they reach the lowest point, suspended momentarily before being pulled back up, their exhilarated smile visible even from a distance.

prompt_en: A person is pushing cart
prompt_opt: A person in a cozy, oversized sweater and jeans pushes a vintage shopping cart down a bustling city street. The cart is filled with colorful items, including fresh produce and a bouquet of flowers. The background features a mix of old and modern buildings, with people walking by, creating a lively urban atmosphere. The person’s determined yet relaxed demeanor is captured in close-up shots, highlighting their focus and contentment as they navigate through the vibrant cityscape.

prompt_en: A person is cleaning windows
prompt_opt: A person in a bright yellow safety vest and dark blue jeans stands on a sturdy ladder, methodically cleaning a large window with a squeegee and a bucket of soapy water. The sunlight reflects off the glass, highlighting the streaks being wiped away. The setting is a modern urban building, with other windows gleaming in the background. The cleaner pauses to wipe their brow, showcasing their dedication and effort. The camera captures close-ups of the sparkling clean glass and the meticulous movements of the squeegee, emphasizing the attention to detail and the transformative effect of their work.

prompt_en: A person is cutting watermelon
prompt_opt: A person in a bright yellow apron stands in a modern kitchen, holding a large, ripe watermelon. They carefully slice it with a sharp, stainless steel knife, revealing the vibrant red flesh and glistening black seeds. The camera captures the precision of their movements, from the initial cut to the neat arrangement of the slices on a white ceramic plate. The kitchen is well-lit, with sunlight streaming through a window, adding a warm and inviting atmosphere to the scene.

prompt_en: A person is cheerleading
prompt_opt: A vibrant person, clad in a red and white cheerleading uniform, performs an energetic routine on a sunny day. They start with a powerful toe touch, their legs extended high and parallel to the ground. Next, they execute a flawless pom-pom wave, their movements synchronized and full of spirit. Then, they leap into the air with a high V-motion, their face beaming with enthusiasm and joy. Finally, they strike a strong pose, one leg lifted and bent, arms raised in triumph, capturing the essence of cheerleading with every frame.

prompt_en: A person is washing hands

Close-up shots capture the water droplets and the meticulous cleaning process, emphasizing hygiene and care. The scene concludes with the person drying their hands on a soft, white towel, their expression one of satisfaction and cleanliness.

prompt_en: A person is ironing

prompt_en: A person is cutting nails

Next, they spread their fingers wide, symbolizing paper, with a confident smile. Finally, they show two fingers in a V-shape, indicating scissors, with a playful glint in their eye. The background is filled with bright, abstract patterns, enhancing the lively atmosphere of the game.

The oil painting highlights the shark's streamlined body, with its dorsal fin cutting through the water, and the sunlight filtering down from the surface, creating a play of light and shadow. The surrounding marine environment is depicted with vibrant colors, from the turquoise shallows to the dark, mysterious depths, emphasizing the shark's dominance and the ocean's beauty.

The shark's dark silhouette is set against a backdrop of frothy whitecaps and deep blue water, evoking the dynamic energy of the sea. In the distance, a stylized wave rises like a mountain, its crest curling into a spiral, reminiscent of Hokusai's famous "Great Wave off Kanagawa." The shark's eyes, sharp and piercing, convey a sense of primal strength and grace, capturing the essence of nature's raw beauty in the Ukiyo-e tradition.

His movements are fluid and almost dance-like, as if he is painting the stars with his presence. The scene captures a blend of scientific exploration and artistic wonder, with the astronaut's form and the surrounding cosmos merging into a breathtaking, dreamlike tableau.

prompt_en: An astronaut flying in space, oil painting

Dressed in a sleek, silver spacesuit with a reflective helmet, he appears weightless and serene. Behind him, the Earth looms large, its blue oceans and swirling clouds a stark contrast to the dark void. The scene is rendered in rich, textured strokes, capturing the ethereal beauty of the cosmos. The astronaut's tether trails behind, adding a sense of movement and connection to the spacecraft in the distance. The oil painting technique brings a dreamlike quality to the image, blending realism with artistic flair.

prompt_en: cafeteria
prompt_opt: A bustling school cafeteria filled with vibrant energy, where students in colorful uniforms chat animatedly at long tables. The room is bathed in natural light from large windows, and the walls are adorned with motivational posters and student artwork. Trays of diverse, appetizing meals are lined up at the serving counters, and the aroma of fresh food fills the air. A mix of laughter and lively conversations echoes throughout the space, capturing the essence of a typical, lively lunch hour.

prompt_en: campsite
prompt_opt: A cozy campsite nestled in a dense forest, with a crackling fire at its center, surrounded by large, weathered logs serving as seats. Smoke gently rises into the starlit night sky, where a full moon casts a soft glow. Tents of various colors are pitched nearby, blending harmoniously with the natural surroundings. A group of friends gather around the fire, some roasting marshmallows on sticks, others engaged in lively conversation. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, capturing the essence of a perfect camping evening.

prompt_en: campus
prompt_opt: A vibrant college campus buzzes with activity under a clear blue sky. Students in casual attire, carrying backpacks and chatting animatedly, walk along tree-lined pathways. The scene captures the energy of academic life, with historic brick buildings and modern glass structures in the background. A group of students gathers on the grassy quad, sitting around a picnic table, while others play frisbee nearby. The camera pans to show a bustling student center, with posters and flyers adorning the walls, and a fountain in the courtyard reflecting the sunny day. The atmosphere is one of excitement and community, perfectly encapsulating the essence of campus life.

prompt_en: carrousel
prompt_opt: A vibrant carousel spins under a clear blue sky, its colorful horses, unicorns, and dragons adorned with intricate details and sparkling decorations. Children laugh and wave from atop their animated steeds, while parents watch with smiles from the sidelines. The scene is set in a lush, green park with a backdrop of towering trees and a distant, picturesque mountain range. The carousel's canopy, festooned with twinkling lights, adds a magical touch as the merry-go-round continues its enchanting rotation, capturing the essence of childhood wonder and joy.

prompt_en: castle
prompt_opt: A majestic medieval castle stands atop a hill, its towering stone walls and turrets silhouetted against a dramatic sky. The castle's grand entrance features massive wooden doors flanked by stone statues of lions. Surrounding the fortress, a moat glistens under the sunlight, while lush green forests stretch into the distance. Inside the castle walls, a cobblestone courtyard is bustling with activity, as guards patrol and villagers go about their daily tasks. The scene captures the timeless grandeur and mystique of a bygone era, with the castle's imposing presence dominating the landscape.

prompt_en: cemetery
prompt_opt: A serene cemetery under a twilight sky, where rows of weathered gravestones and ornate monuments stand quietly among tall, shadowy trees. Soft, golden light filters through the branches, casting a gentle glow on the moss-covered stones. In the distance, a lone figure walks slowly along a winding path, adding a sense of solitude and reflection to the scene. The camera pans to capture the intricate details of the tombstones and the peaceful atmosphere, emphasizing the calm and timeless nature of the place.

prompt_en: classroom
prompt_opt: A vibrant classroom filled with diverse students, each engaged in their own activities. Desks are arranged in clusters, with colorful posters and educational charts adorning the walls. Natural light streams in through large windows, casting a warm glow over the room. A teacher, dressed in a professional yet approachable manner, moves between the desks, offering guidance and support. One student is seen enthusiastically raising their hand, while another focuses intently on a science experiment. The atmosphere is lively and conducive to learning, with a sense of collaboration and curiosity permeating the space.

prompt_en: cliff
prompt_opt: A dramatic cliff rises from the turbulent sea, its rugged face weathered by time and the elements. At the top, wild grasses sway in the strong coastal wind, while seagulls glide overhead. The sky is a mix of stormy grays and patches of sunlight, casting dynamic shadows across the landscape. Waves crash against the base of the cliff, sending spray high into the air, emphasizing the raw power of nature. In the distance, the horizon merges the sea and sky, creating a breathtaking and awe-inspiring scene.

prompt_en: crosswalk
prompt_opt: A bustling city street at dusk, where a crosswalk is illuminated by the warm glow of streetlights. Pedestrians, dressed in a mix of casual and formal attire, navigate the crosswalk with purpose. Some chat on their phones, others walk in pairs, and a few pause to look at their surroundings. The background features a blend of modern skyscrapers and older brick buildings, with the occasional cyclist weaving through the crowd. The crosswalk's white lines stand out sharply against the darkening pavement, creating a dynamic and vibrant urban scene.

prompt_en: construction site
prompt_opt: A bustling construction site comes to life under a clear blue sky, with towering cranes and scaffolding dominating the scene. Workers in high-visibility vests and hard hats navigate the busy area, operating heavy machinery and laying down concrete. The sound of hammering and drilling fills the air, while trucks and excavators move earth and materials. In the background, partially completed structures rise, framed by the vibrant colors of safety cones and warning signs, creating a dynamic and energetic atmosphere of progress and development.

prompt_en: corridor
prompt_opt: A long, elegantly lit corridor with high ceilings and intricate chandeliers stretches into the distance. The walls are adorned with rich, burgundy wallpaper and framed vintage paintings, creating a sense of history and grandeur. Soft, ambient light casts gentle shadows, enhancing the corridor's mysterious and inviting atmosphere. Periodic doorways lead to unseen rooms, adding an air of intrigue. The polished wooden floor reflects the warm glow of the chandeliers, making each step resonate with a subtle creak, evoking a timeless elegance.

prompt_en: courtyard
prompt_opt: A serene courtyard bathed in the golden light of late afternoon, with vibrant flowers in full bloom lining the cobblestone pathways. Tall, elegant trees cast dappled shadows, and a central fountain spurts water gently, creating a soothing soundtrack. Benches placed under the trees offer inviting spots for relaxation. The surrounding buildings, with their rustic stone walls and ornate iron railings, add a touch of timeless charm. In the background, the soft chirping of birds and the occasional rustle of leaves enhance the tranquil atmosphere.

prompt_en: desert
prompt_opt: A vast, sun-baked desert stretches endlessly under a clear blue sky, with rolling dunes of golden sand that shimmer in the intense sunlight. In the foreground, a lone cactus stands resilient, its spines glistening. The camera pans to reveal a distant rocky outcrop, casting long shadows as the sun begins to set, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink. The scene captures the serene and stark beauty of the desert, emphasizing its timeless and untouched nature.

prompt_en: downtown
prompt_opt: A bustling downtown scene comes to life with vibrant cityscapes. Tall skyscrapers with glass facades reflect the bright sunlight, casting shimmering shadows on the streets below. Crowds of people in diverse attire navigate the sidewalks, some chatting on their phones, others sipping coffee from local cafes. Street vendors line the curbs, offering fresh flowers and artisanal goods. Cars and bicycles weave through the traffic, while a double-decker bus passes by, its upper deck filled with tourists taking in the sights. The energy of the city is palpable, with the hum of conversations and the distant sound of street music creating a lively atmosphere.

prompt_en: driveway
prompt_opt: A wide, curved driveway leads up to a modern, two-story house with clean lines and large windows. The driveway is paved with dark asphalt and flanked by neatly trimmed hedges and colorful flowers. In the foreground, a sleek, silver sedan is parked, its surface reflecting the afternoon sunlight. The house’s front door, made of rich wood, stands open, inviting viewers into the home. The scene is set on a sunny day, with a clear blue sky and a few fluffy clouds, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

prompt_en: farm
prompt_opt: A picturesque farm scene unfolds with a red barn standing prominently against a clear blue sky. Golden fields of wheat sway gently in the breeze, while a rustic wooden fence lines the property. A farmer in a plaid shirt and denim jeans walks alongside a brown horse, leading it toward the barn. In the distance, a small herd of cows grazes peacefully in a lush green pasture. The sun casts a warm glow over the landscape, creating a serene and idyllic rural atmosphere.

prompt_en: food court
prompt_opt: A bustling food court filled with diverse cuisines and vibrant energy. Shiny metal tables and colorful plastic chairs line the expansive space, with people of all ages enjoying their meals. In the background, various food stalls are adorned with eye-catching signs and mouth-watering displays. One stall features steaming bowls of noodles, another offers crispy fried chicken, and yet another showcases fresh sushi rolls. The aroma of sizzling food and the chatter of patrons create a lively atmosphere, capturing the essence of a vibrant dining hub.

prompt_en: football field
prompt_opt: A vast, well-manicured football field stretches under a clear blue sky, with pristine green grass and crisp white lines marking the playing area. The field is surrounded by a track and bleachers, which are empty, emphasizing the tranquility of the scene. A gentle breeze ruffles the grass, and the sun casts a warm, golden glow, creating a perfect setting for an upcoming game. The camera pans across the field, capturing the symmetry and beauty of the venue, highlighting the goalposts at each end and the finely detailed markings on the turf.

prompt_en: forest road
prompt_opt: A winding forest road stretches into the distance, flanked by tall, lush evergreen trees that form a natural canopy overhead. Sunlight filters through the dense foliage, casting dappled shadows on the moss-covered ground. The road, lined with fallen leaves and small wildflowers, invites exploration. A gentle mist rises from the forest floor, adding an ethereal quality to the scene. In the background, the soft sounds of birdsong and rustling leaves enhance the serene and peaceful atmosphere.

prompt_en: fountain
prompt_opt: A majestic fountain stands at the center of a sunlit plaza, its intricate stone carvings glistening with water. Jets of water shoot upwards, forming elegant arcs that cascade back into the basin below. Surrounding the fountain, vibrant flowers and lush greenery add a burst of color. People stroll by, some pausing to admire the beauty, while others sit on nearby benches, enjoying the soothing sounds of flowing water. The sky above is a clear blue, casting a warm, golden glow over the scene, creating a tranquil and inviting atmosphere.

prompt_en: gas station
prompt_opt: A bustling gas station at dusk, with a row of cars lining up at the pumps. The neon lights of the convenience store cast a warm glow, illuminating the scene. A diverse group of people can be seen interacting—some chatting near their vehicles, others browsing inside the store. The pumps are modern and well-lit, with digital displays showing prices and payment options. In the background, a large billboard advertises the latest fuel discounts and loyalty programs. The overall atmosphere is one of activity and routine, capturing the essence of a typical evening at a busy gas station.

prompt_en: glacier
prompt_opt: A vast, ancient glacier stretches across the screen, its icy surface glistening under the clear, blue sky. The camera pans over the rugged, crevassed landscape, capturing the intricate details of the ice formations. Snowy peaks loom in the distance, reflecting the sun's rays, while a crystal-clear river flows at the base of the glacier, adding a serene soundtrack to the scene. The pristine, frozen environment exudes a sense of timeless beauty and natural majesty.

prompt_en: golf course
prompt_opt: A lush, verdant golf course stretches out under a clear blue sky, with meticulously manicured fairways and emerald-green putting greens. In the distance, rolling hills and mature trees frame the scenic landscape. Golfers in casual yet stylish attire are seen walking the course, some swinging their clubs with precision, others casually chatting. The sun casts a warm, golden glow, enhancing the natural beauty of the setting. A tranquil pond reflects the surrounding foliage, adding a touch of serenity to the picturesque scene.

prompt_en: indoor gymnasium
prompt_opt: A spacious indoor gymnasium with high ceilings and large windows letting in natural light. The polished wooden floor reflects the vibrant colors of the basketball hoops and the brightly painted lines marking various court areas. Athletes in team uniforms are seen practicing, some dribbling basketballs, others performing agility drills. In the background, a group of spectators sit on metal bleachers, adding to the lively atmosphere. The walls are adorned with motivational posters and championship banners, creating a dynamic and energetic environment.

prompt_en: harbor
prompt_opt: A bustling harbor scene unfolds with sailboats and yachts gently rocking in the calm waters, their masts swaying rhythmically. Fishermen in weathered jackets tend to their nets and lines, while seagulls circle overhead, calling out against the backdrop of a vibrant sunset. The dock is lined with colorful buildings and shops, their lights beginning to twinkle as evening approaches. People stroll along the wooden planks, enjoying the maritime atmosphere, and a small ferry arrives, disgorging a mix of locals and tourists. The sky transitions from warm oranges and pinks to deep blues, casting a serene glow over the entire scene.

prompt_en: highway
prompt_opt: A sleek, modern highway stretches endlessly into the horizon, bathed in the golden glow of a setting sun. Cars and trucks zip by in a steady stream, their headlights and taillights creating a mesmerizing trail of light. The sky above is a vibrant blend of orange, pink, and purple, with wisps of clouds adding depth and texture. Tall, lush trees line both sides of the road, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. As the camera pans along the highway, it captures the seamless flow of traffic and the serene beauty of the surrounding landscape, creating a sense of movement and adventure.

prompt_en: hospital
prompt_opt: A bustling hospital corridor filled with healthcare professionals in crisp white coats and scrubs, moving purposefully. Patients in wheelchairs and on gurneys are being attended to by nurses, while family members wait anxiously in the background. The scene shifts to a bright, modern waiting room where people sit quietly, some reading magazines or using their phones. Inside a patient room, a doctor consults with a patient, discussing their treatment plan, while medical equipment hums softly in the background. The video captures the blend of urgency, care, and hope that defines the hospital environment.

prompt_en: house
prompt_opt: A charming cottage nestled in a lush, green landscape, with a thatched roof, whitewashed walls, and a small, winding stone path leading to its front door. The garden is bursting with colorful flowers and well-manicured shrubs, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere. Sunlight filters through the trees, casting dappled shadows on the ground. A wooden bench sits near the side of the house, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the natural beauty surrounding it.

prompt_en: iceberg
prompt_opt: A massive iceberg towers in the frame, its pristine white surface glistening under the soft, diffused sunlight. The ice is sculpted by nature into intricate formations, with deep blue crevasses and jagged edges. Seagulls soar overhead, their calls echoing across the icy landscape. The surrounding water is a calm, deep blue, reflecting the towering ice. As the camera pans around, it captures the iceberg's majestic presence, highlighting the interplay of light and shadow on its surface. The scene conveys a sense of awe and the raw beauty of the natural world.

prompt_en: industrial area
prompt_opt: A vast industrial area sprawls under a gray, overcast sky, with towering smokestacks emitting plumes of steam into the air. Cranes and heavy machinery dot the landscape, while cargo containers and shipping docks line the perimeter. Workers in bright safety vests and hard hats move about, adding a sense of bustling activity. The scene is punctuated by the rhythmic sounds of machinery and the occasional horn of a passing freight train, creating a vivid portrayal of a busy industrial zone.

prompt_en: jail cell
prompt_opt: A dimly lit jail cell with cold, gray stone walls and a heavy metal door, rusted from years of use. Inside, a narrow cot with a thin, tattered blanket and a small, cracked window high up, allowing a sliver of natural light to filter in. The floor is made of rough stone, and a single, flickering light bulb hangs from the ceiling, casting long shadows. A metal sink and toilet are bolted to one wall, adding to the stark, oppressive atmosphere.

prompt_en: junkyard
prompt_opt: A vast, sprawling junkyard stretches under a cloudy sky, filled with rows of rusting cars, twisted metal, and discarded machinery. Overgrown weeds and tall grass poke through the ground, adding a touch of nature reclaiming the abandoned space. In the foreground, a dilapidated pickup truck sits half-buried in the dirt, its windows shattered and doors hanging loosely. Scattered tires, old appliances, and broken parts litter the ground, creating a chaotic yet strangely mesmerizing scene. A lone crow perches atop a pile of scrap metal, surveying the desolate landscape, while the distant sound of a passing train adds a haunting echo to the atmosphere.

prompt_en: kitchen
prompt_opt: A modern, sunlit kitchen with sleek, white cabinets and a marble countertop. A stainless steel fridge and high-end appliances add a touch of elegance. Fresh herbs and flowers sit in small vases on the counter, and a bowl of ripe fruits adds a pop of color. In the center, a woman in a floral apron is chopping vegetables with precision, her movements graceful and confident. The natural light streaming in through large windows highlights the clean, inviting space, making the kitchen feel warm and welcoming.

prompt_en: indoor library
prompt_opt: A cozy indoor library with tall, wooden bookshelves lining the walls, filled with countless books of various colors and sizes. Soft, ambient lighting from elegant chandeliers casts a warm glow, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere. A few people are quietly browsing, their faces illuminated by the gentle light. In the center, a large, round table is surrounded by plush armchairs, where a woman in a cardigan sits reading a thick novel. The air is filled with the subtle scent of old pages and the occasional rustle of turning leaves, enhancing the sense of tranquility and intellectual exploration.

prompt_en: lighthouse
prompt_opt: A majestic lighthouse stands tall on a rocky cliff, its white and red-striped tower gleaming under the golden sunset. Waves crash against the rugged shore below, creating a symphony of sound. The lighthouse beam rotates steadily, casting a guiding light across the vast, darkening sea. Seagulls glide gracefully in the background, adding a touch of serene beauty to the scene. The sky is painted with warm hues of orange, pink, and purple, creating a breathtaking backdrop for the iconic structure.

prompt_en: laboratory
prompt_opt: A modern laboratory filled with sleek, white countertops and advanced scientific equipment. A scientist in a white lab coat and safety goggles meticulously adjusts a complex apparatus, her focused expression illuminated by the soft glow of monitors displaying intricate data. Shelves lined with neatly arranged vials and beakers reflect the organized precision of the space. In the background, another scientist consults a digital tablet, their collaboration highlighting the cutting-edge research being conducted. The room is bathed in a cool, sterile light, emphasizing the high-tech environment and the dedication of the scientists.

prompt_en: mansion
prompt_opt: A grand mansion stands majestically on a hill, its sprawling architecture featuring intricate stone carvings, towering columns, and a sweeping front porch. The sun casts a warm glow on the manicured gardens, where vibrant flowers and lush greenery surround a pristine fountain. Inside, opulent chandeliers hang from high ceilings, illuminating lavish rooms filled with antique furniture and ornate decorations. The mansion's grand staircase leads to a second-floor balcony, offering a panoramic view of the estate's vast grounds and the distant horizon.

prompt_en: marsh
prompt_opt: A tranquil marsh at sunrise, where mist hovers gently over the calm water, reflecting the soft hues of the sky. Tall reeds sway in the gentle breeze, and a variety of water birds, including ducks and herons, begin their morning activities. The scene captures the serene beauty of nature, with the early light casting a golden glow over the wetlands, highlighting the intricate patterns of the marsh vegetation and the stillness of the water.

prompt_en: mountain
prompt_opt: A majestic mountain rises against a clear blue sky, its peak dusted with snow. The rugged terrain is covered in lush green forests that slope down to a serene lake at the base. Sunlight filters through the trees, casting dappled shadows on the ground. A gentle mist hovers over the lake, adding an ethereal quality to the scene. The camera pans slowly, capturing the breathtaking beauty of the natural landscape, from the towering summit to the tranquil waters below.

prompt_en: indoor movie theater
prompt_opt: A cozy indoor movie theater with plush red velvet seats arranged in rows, dimly lit by soft ambient lights. The large silver screen glows with a preview of an upcoming film, casting a gentle light across the audience. Popcorn buckets and soda cups sit on the armrests, adding to the nostalgic atmosphere. The walls are adorned with vintage movie posters, and a small concession stand is visible in the background, complete with a neon sign. The air is filled with the aroma of buttery popcorn, enhancing the immersive experience of a classic cinema setting.

prompt_en: indoor museum
prompt_opt: A bustling indoor museum filled with natural light streaming through large windows, showcasing a diverse array of exhibits. Visitors wander through the spacious galleries, admiring ancient artifacts, intricate sculptures, and vibrant paintings. Detailed plaques provide historical context, while interactive displays engage younger visitors. The atmosphere is one of awe and curiosity, with the soft hum of conversations and the occasional excited whisper adding to the vibrant scene.

prompt_en: music studio
prompt_opt: A vibrant music studio comes to life with warm, ambient lighting. High-quality equipment lines the walls, including a grand piano, a drum set, and an array of guitars and microphones. A talented musician sits at the piano, fingers gracefully gliding over the keys, while another plays the guitar with passion. The drummer keeps a steady beat, and a vocalist stands in front of a microphone, eyes closed, lost in the melody. The room is filled with the rich, resonant sound of live music, capturing the essence of creativity and collaboration.

prompt_en: nursery
prompt_opt: A cozy nursery with soft, pastel walls and a large window letting in warm sunlight. A plush, white rug covers the floor, and a beautifully crafted wooden crib stands in the corner, adorned with a delicate, cream-colored quilt. Shelves lined with colorful books and toys add a playful touch, while a rocking chair in the corner invites moments of calm and comfort. A mobile of gentle, spinning animals hangs above the crib, casting soothing shadows on the walls. The room is a haven of tranquility and joy, perfectly designed for a baby's first years.

prompt_en: ocean
prompt_opt: A vast, tranquil ocean stretches endlessly under a sky painted with soft hues of pink and orange, signaling the approach of sunset. Waves gently lap against the shore, creating a soothing rhythm. A lone seagull glides overhead, its wings catching the last rays of sunlight. The water shimmers with a blend of blues and greens, reflecting the serene beauty of nature. In the distance, a few clouds drift lazily, adding depth to the sky. The scene captures the peaceful essence of the ocean, inviting viewers to lose themselves in its calming majesty.

prompt_en: office
prompt_opt: A modern office space features sleek, minimalist desks arranged in rows, each equipped with a high-resolution monitor and a tidy workspace. Natural light streams in through large windows, casting a warm glow over the room. Employees, dressed in casual business attire, are seen collaborating and working diligently. In the background, a wall-mounted whiteboard displays strategic plans and project timelines. The overall atmosphere is one of productivity and professionalism, with the clean lines and neutral colors enhancing the sense of focus and efficiency.

prompt_en: palace
prompt_opt: A grand palace stands majestically under a clear blue sky, its intricate architecture featuring towering spires, ornate balconies, and expansive gardens. The camera pans across the opulent façade, highlighting golden embellishments and marble columns. Inside, lavish rooms adorned with chandeliers, tapestries, and intricate frescoes showcase the palace's regal beauty. The scene transitions to a lush courtyard where fountains gently spray water, surrounded by blooming flowers and manicured hedges. Finally, the view shifts to a panoramic shot of the palace from a distance, emphasizing its grandeur and the serene landscape that surrounds it.

prompt_en: parking lot
prompt_opt: A bustling parking lot at twilight, filled with a variety of cars under the glow of flickering streetlights. People hurry across the asphalt, some carrying shopping bags, others chatting on their phones. The scene captures the hustle and bustle of urban life, with the occasional sound of car doors slamming and engines starting. The sky above is a blend of deep blues and purples, adding a serene yet vibrant atmosphere to the busy environment.

prompt_en: pharmacy
prompt_opt: A bustling pharmacy with shelves lined from floor to ceiling with an array of medications, supplements, and health products. A pharmacist in a white coat stands behind the counter, attentively consulting with a customer. Soft, ambient lighting and modern decor create a welcoming atmosphere. Customers browse the aisles, some holding shopping baskets, while others wait patiently at the prescription pickup window. The background hum of activity and the organized, clean layout enhance the professional and helpful environment.

prompt_en: phone booth
prompt_opt: A vintage red phone booth stands alone on a bustling city street, its glass panes slightly fogged from the cool evening air. Inside, a woman in a long black coat and red scarf adjusts the receiver, her expression a mix of anticipation and concern. The neon lights of nearby shops cast a soft glow, reflecting off the wet pavement. As she speaks into the phone, her silhouette is framed by the iconic red exterior, capturing a moment of solitude amidst the urban chaos.

prompt_en: raceway
prompt_opt: A high-speed chase unfolds on a sleek, modern raceway, where the sun casts long shadows across the polished asphalt. Cars zoom by in a blur of colors, their engines roaring with power. The camera captures the intense focus of the drivers, their helmets gleaming under the bright lights. Spectators line the track, their cheers adding to the adrenaline-fueled atmosphere. The scene shifts to a close-up of a car's wheels spinning rapidly, followed by a wide shot of the raceway, showcasing the precision and skill of the racers as they navigate sharp turns and straightaways with breathtaking speed.

prompt_en: restaurant
prompt_opt: A bustling restaurant with warm, ambient lighting fills the scene. Wooden tables adorned with white tablecloths and elegant place settings create an inviting atmosphere. Patrons chat animatedly, their faces illuminated by the soft glow of candlelight. In the background, a chef expertly plates dishes in the open kitchen, while servers elegantly navigate the dining room. The walls are lined with vintage wine bottles and artistic prints, adding a touch of sophistication. The camera pans to capture the lively energy, from the clinking of glasses to the aromas of gourmet cuisine wafting through the air.

prompt_en: river
prompt_opt: A serene river winds through a lush, green valley, its crystal-clear waters reflecting the vibrant foliage and dappled sunlight. Tall, ancient trees line the banks, their branches reaching over the water, creating a canopy of shade. In the distance, a small waterfall cascades into the river, adding a soothing soundtrack to the scene. A gentle mist rises from the water, enhancing the tranquil atmosphere. Along the riverbank, wildflowers bloom in patches of color, and a few smooth, rounded stones dot the shallow edges. The camera captures the river's flow from various angles, emphasizing its beauty and the harmony of nature.

prompt_en: science museum
prompt_opt: A bustling science museum comes to life with vibrant exhibits and curious visitors. Inside, a large hall features interactive displays, including a massive dinosaur skeleton towering overhead. Children and adults alike gather around a hands-on exhibit, where they can manipulate gears and levers to understand mechanical principles. In another area, a holographic display showcases the solar system, with planets rotating in mid-air. Visitors marvel at a life-sized model of the human heart, complete with pulsating lights to simulate blood flow. The atmosphere is filled with excitement and learning, capturing the wonder of scientific discovery.

prompt_en: shower
prompt_opt: A woman stands in a modern, minimalist shower, the water cascading gently over her. The tiles are sleek and white, reflecting the soft, ambient light. She closes her eyes, savoring the warmth, her hair darkening as it becomes soaked. The steam rises, creating a serene and calming atmosphere. Her face shows a moment of pure relaxation, as the water continues to flow, cleansing and rejuvenating.

prompt_en: ski slope
prompt_opt: A pristine ski slope winds through a forest of tall, snow-covered pines, the fresh powder glistening under the bright winter sun. Skiers of all ages and skill levels carve graceful turns down the mountain, their colorful outfits contrasting vividly against the white landscape. The air is crisp and clear, and the sound of laughter and the rush of wind can be heard as skiers enjoy the perfect conditions. At the base of the slope, a cozy lodge with smoke curling from its chimney invites weary travelers to rest and warm up, completing the idyllic winter scene.

prompt_en: sky
prompt_opt: A vast, expansive sky dominates the frame, transitioning from deep indigo to vibrant orange and pink as the sun rises. Clouds, painted in hues of gold and lavender, drift lazily across the horizon, creating a mesmerizing tapestry of colors. The sky is alive with the play of light, capturing the essence of a new day dawning. As the scene progresses, the colors shift to a serene blue, with wisps of white clouds floating gently, evoking a sense of peace and tranquility.

prompt_en: skyscraper
prompt_opt: A towering skyscraper stands majestically against a clear blue sky, its sleek glass facade reflecting the sun's rays. The building's modern architecture features sharp lines and a pointed spire that reaches toward the heavens. At street level, bustling city life surrounds the base, with people walking by and cars driving past. As the camera pans upward, the intricate details of the building's design become apparent, from the elegant window patterns to the subtle lighting that enhances its grandeur. The skyscraper dominates the skyline, a symbol of urban sophistication and engineering prowess.

prompt_en: baseball stadium
prompt_opt: A bustling baseball stadium fills the screen, its seats packed with enthusiastic fans in team jerseys, waving colorful banners and cheering loudly. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow on the lush green field. The pitcher, in a crisp white uniform with the team logo, winds up and delivers a perfect pitch. The batter swings with all his might, sending the ball soaring into the outfield. The crowd erupts in excitement as the players run the bases, the tension and energy palpable in every frame. The camera captures close-ups of the players' determined faces and the fans' ecstatic reactions, creating a vibrant and dynamic atmosphere.

prompt_en: staircase
prompt_opt: A grand, spiraling staircase with polished wooden banisters and intricate iron railings leads upward, bathed in warm, natural light streaming through large, arched windows. Each step is meticulously crafted, inviting viewers to follow its elegant ascent. The background features a blend of rich, earthy tones and soft, ambient lighting, creating a sense of timeless beauty and tranquility.

prompt_en: street
prompt_opt: A bustling city street at twilight, lined with vintage lampposts casting warm glows on cobblestone pavements. People in fashionable coats and scarves hurry past, their footsteps echoing. Cars from a bygone era cruise slowly, adding to the nostalgic atmosphere. The street is flanked by elegant buildings with ornate facades, some adorned with festive lights. A street performer plays a melodic tune on an acoustic guitar, drawing a small, appreciative crowd. The scene captures the vibrant energy and timeless charm of an urban evening.

prompt_en: supermarket
prompt_opt: A bustling supermarket filled with vibrant displays of fresh produce, colorful aisles lined with groceries, and cheerful customers shopping with purpose. Shelves stocked high with everything from baked goods to household essentials, with natural light streaming in through large windows. A friendly cashier rings up purchases at the checkout, while a team of employees restocks shelves and assists shoppers. The atmosphere is lively yet organized, capturing the essence of everyday life and community.

prompt_en: indoor swimming pool
prompt_opt: A sleek, modern indoor swimming pool bathed in soft, ambient lighting. The water is crystal clear, reflecting the warm glow of overhead lights. Tiles in shades of blue and white line the walls and floor, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere. A few lounge chairs and umbrellas are placed along the edge of the pool, adding a touch of relaxation.
